abstract: Steven VanRoekel, who has been a leader at Microsoft and the F.C.C., will take over as chief information officer for the federal government.
snippet: Steven VanRoekel, who has been a leader at Microsoft and the F.C.C., will take over as chief information officer for the federal government.
lead_paragraph: Steven VanRoekel, a former Microsoft executive, will become the next chief information officer for the federal government — a bigger, more policy-oriented technology job than any he held at the software giant.

headline.main: White House Names a New Chief of Information Technology
headline.print_headline: White House Names a New Chief of Information Technology
